channel.title: Enjoyment on The Sovereign Library
channel.description: Recent content in Enjoyment on The Sovereign Library

item.title: Enjoyment as a Line Item
item.description:
Enjoyment as a Line Item

Summary: Personal enjoyment is treated as a legitimate asset line item, not a reward. Example: tangible ‘sovereign enjoyment’ vehicle goal.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batches 1, 3

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.

item.title: Pleasure Architecture vs Gate Systems
item.description:
Pleasure Architecture vs Gate Systems

Summary: ‘Pleasure Architecture’ is flagged as high substitution risk: if pleasure is built via ‘gate systems’ it must be forced through RCP to prevent avoidance/displacement.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batch 3

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
